# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a detected object observation.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ observation: VNDetectedObjectObservation)
```

## Creating an observation

- **init(boundingBox:)**: Creates a detected object observation with the bounding box you specify.

items.description: Creates a detected object observation with the bounding box you specify.
